metadata.synopsis: A small group discuss the next step of the local Rivingtonian militia concerning the "Refugee issue". There are too many outsiders in Rivington walking the street without "escort" to their taste. This is the human child one-liner.
metadata.how_to_trigger: - go to 2;50;-18.- Dialogue should when talking to the human child in front of the well.

1.speaker: Rhett
1.text: We're gonna protect the city - I promise!

2.speaker: Rhett
2.text: Dad says there's already too many refugees and the city can't hold anymore. We've got to keep them out.
2.context: NodeContext: 'this is our city' is clearly something he's parroting from his dad

3.speaker: Rhett
3.text: I'm not supposed to talk to outsiders.
